backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature-to-file mapping describing implemented functionality and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file containing metadata, SEO tags, social previews, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component assembling all sections with smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Validated contact form with input fields, error messages, submit handling, and success/error UI states.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll styling, smooth section navigation, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Reusable card component showing project thumbnail, details, tech stack, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with descriptive text and a grid of feature items using SectionShell.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a Contact section with contact details and a contact form inside SectionShell.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Implements a footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a bottom attribution bar.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero area with background visuals, heading, subheading, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows a grid of project cards sourced from the projects dataset inside SectionShell.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: A reusable layout wrapper that provides consistent section structure with titles and content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a services grid with cards displaying service info, icons, and tags.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Lists categorized skills using badges inside a structured SectionShell layout.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports an array of sample project metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a custom React hook managing contact form state, validation, submission simulation, and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context and provider using Dfinity AuthClient, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks interacting with the backend; currently contains no active queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, animations, and global typography and focus rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root, wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, radii, shadows, and integrates plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, image needs, and current state tracking for the portfolio website build.
